Detailed Description

SubUnitReference is an collection of BtAvrcpCommandInterface a reference to a/v plugin and its name Used in creating a Item Container of SubUnitReference

void SubUnitReference::ConnectResponse (  btapi_avrcp_handle_t  avrcp_handle  )  [inline]
 

Invoked to send back the response for the connect request. btapi_avrcp_handle_t is sent as a parameter in order to handle further operations

BtAvrcpCommandInterface* SubUnitReference::GetAvrcpAppReference (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns audio/video application reference (Eg: Media player)

BtAvrcpProfileOperationService* SubUnitReference::GetAvrcpOperationService (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns reference to the BtAvrcp Operation service Each device(sub unit) is associated with a Operation instance

void SubUnitReference::InitAvrcpOperationService (   )  [inline]
